issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.5.0.fb4b340. G2 (2.2) 2.1 emulator

1.Mashups > YQL > YQL + Flickr
2.adb logcat

results: all the images load, but I see the following output:

W/TiUIImageView(28718): (main) [181,39373] The url property of ImageView is deprecated, use image instead.
W/TiDrawableReference(28718): (main) [5,39378] Could not open stream for drawable, therefore bounds checking could not be completed
W/TiDrawableReference(28718): (main) [0,39378] Bitmap bounds could not be determined. If bitmap is loaded, it won't be scaled.
W/TiDrawableReference(28718): (main) [3,39381] Could not open stream to get bitmap

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Unexpected output on YQL + Flickr ("could not open stream to bitmap"), test seems to work as expected though

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
